chapter.title: Accepting a Dependency
chapter.p: When a new dependency has been raised on a project, Mingle will display a counter next to the Dependency Tab. The tab is the central location for a project's dependencies. By linking one or more card(s) to a dependency, you are associating those cards to that dependency.

To accept a dependency, navigate to the Dependency Tab and open the dependency. Clicking on the Accept button or the + icon next to "Resolving Cards" will prompt you to link resolving cards within your project to the dependency. These resolving card(s) will represent the work needed to resolve the dependency.

bullets.item: Desired completion date: This date is given by the raising project and represents when they expect the dependency to be resolved.

Resolving card(s): By clicking on the + icon, you can search for cards within the project to link to the dependency. There is no limit to the number of cards you can link to a dependency. You can also unlink the cards by clicking on the x icon.
